title: BRIEF-Orminex Posts July Gold Production Of 1,818 Recovered Ounce
text:
BRIEF-Orminex Posts July Gold Production Of 1,818 Recovered Ounce

Commodities 13 minutes ago (Sep 10, 2019 17:40)

BRIEF-Orminex Posts July Gold Production Of 1,818 Recovered Ounce Sept 10 (Reuters) - Orminex Ltd : * JULY GOLD PRODUCTION OF 1,818 RECOVERED OUNCE, AT 94% RECOVERY FROM KINGS BOUNTY AT AVERAGE HEAD GRADE OF 3.53 G/T * MINERAL VENTURES & AN ALTERNATE DIRECTOR OF CO ENTERED A BINDING SALE AGREEMENT TO BUY BURBANKS MILL

BRIEF-Orminex Posts July Gold Production Of 1,818 Recovered Ounce
